subject: Re: desktop-base and KDE
body:
On 4/27/07, Daniel Baumann  wrote:
> Hi,

Hi Daniel,

> on the live systems, we install 'desktop-base' and e.g for gnome[0] or
> xfce[1], we get these wonderful backgrounds.
>
> for kde[2], it doesn't seem to work. what am I doing wrong? all
> screenshots are etch-based.

It seems that you're doing nothing wrong, it might work for KDE the
same way as in GNOME and Xfce, out of the box. Could you just confirm
that the desktop-base version is 4.0.1? What about `ls -al
/etc/alternatives/desktop*' command output ?

Fathi, any hint?

regards,
-- stratus
http://stratusandtheswirl.blogspot.com


--
